results.name: Same rule as Aitken triangle (A011971) except a(0,0)=1, a(1,0)=0.
comment: First differences of A046935 = this triangle seen as flattened list without the initial term. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 10 2013
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..125 of triangle, flattened
xref: Borders give A032347 and A032346. Cf. A046935.
